settings.editor: Extreme Aerial Photography and Video Artistry for Lifestyle, Action and Commerce

settings.title: AERIAL PHOTOGRAPHY AND VIDEO PRODUCTION SERVICES

settings.editor: Our aerial photography and video services combine technology, experience and passion, which is conveyed in all of our finished work. - From a simple to an intricate shoot, from a small budget to a full scale movie budget, we will translate your idea into a gorgeous, impacting, shareable digital medium!

settings.title: OPEN NEW HORIZONS WITH DRONE MEDIA

settings.editor: From the simplest of screw to most elaborate of editing systems - only the highest quality of equipment is utilized.
We have worked on everything from real estate to major motion pictures. We have learned through training.
We are a complete package backed by the best aviation insurance, and by the top 2 drone/aviation attorneys.

settings.description_text_a: With hundreds of hours in flight, our unique cinematic approach is solidly rooted in a decade of professional experience. Our studio's strength lies in our diverse backgrounds in architecture, cinematography, photography and graphics.

settings.description_text_b: With equal passions for art, technology and entrepreneurship, he lives for the creative rigor of a new challenge and business relationship. His diverse skills and leadership fuel our multi-disciplinary team to reach for greater heights.

settings.description_text_a: Creativity in the drone space has just begun to find new ways. With this relatively new art form, there are so many ways to go about shooting. That is why we created Drone Media. It's a platform where we can connect by inspiring each other.

settings.title: THE FUTURE IS CLOSER THAN YOU THINK

slides.content: Airborne Works was very good to work with. They were really detailed and arrived on time. The drone was quality work and we would definitely hire them again!
